name: Opposite Attraction (Johnrasc)
description:
This game is made for Xanderjam #4

Game Jam Theme: Opposite Attract

I made this game in less than 10 hours and this is about magnet

because magnet has the opposite attraction because the North pole and South pole attracts each other even though they are different

And this is a really Hard Game :)

Use A and D or left and Right arrow to move

And Space to jump

-It has 10 levels

-Have a Fun fact

- and More!!!

Check it out! comment if you like it!

And if you want to support me you can donate some dollars

That's all

THANKS and Have a NICE day!!!
